item.title: 力拓与嘉能可的超级合并能否成功？
item.description:
本期播客聚焦：为何矿业界梦寐以求的超级合并有望成为现实

【原文：

On this week’s podcast: Why the mining industry’s dream mega-merger could become reality

item.title: 《环球时报》称特朗普对华芯片政策"具有歧视性"
item.description: 中国官方媒体驳斥了特朗普政府对英伟达公司向中国出售高端芯片所设条件属于"歧视性"行为，而美国正逐步解除对该亚洲国家实施的实质性出口禁令。【原文：Chinese state media has dismissed the Trump administration’s conditions on the sale of Nvidia Corp.’s high-end chips to China as “discriminatory,” as the US moves closer to reversing an effective ban on their exports to the Asian country.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴迈出重要一步，将淘宝购物与核心AI应用程序相连接
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司计划将其旗舰在线购物和旅游服务与人工智能应用程序相连接，这是该公司迄今为止为将Qwen打造为面向消费者的综合人工智能平台所迈出的最大一步。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. plans to link its flagship online shopping and travel services to its AI app, taking its biggest step yet to build Qwen into its one-stop artificial intelligence platform for consumers.】

item.title: 亚马逊猛烈抨击萨克斯融资协议，称其股权“毫无价值”
item.description: 亚马逊公司正对萨克斯全球企业申请破产保护提出质疑，称这家奢侈品零售商违反了在亚马逊网站销售萨克斯产品的协议，且其对这家现已破产企业的股权投资"推定为无价值"。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is challenging Saks Global Enterprises’ foray into Chapter 11, saying the luxury retailer breached a deal related to the sale of Saks products on its website and that its equity investment in the now bankrupt business is “presumptively worthless.”】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商SpacemiT获得8600万美元新一轮融资
item.description: 中国芯片公司SpacemiT在最新融资轮中筹集逾6亿元人民币（约合8600万美元），用于加速产品商业化进程并拓展业务规模。【原文：Chinese chip company SpacemiT raised more than 600 million yuan ($86 million) in a fresh funding round to speed up commercialization of its products and expand its business.】

item.title: OpenAI从Mira Murati的人工智能初创公司挖角三名员工
item.description: OpenAI已从Thinking Machines Lab（由前OpenAI首席技术官Mira Murati领导的人工智能初创公司）聘请了三名员工。【原文：OpenAI has hired three staffers from Thinking Machines Lab, the artificial intelligence startup led by former OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格坚挺与疲软的中国需求难以调和
item.description: 铁矿石今年开局强劲的态势，持续凸显了许多观察人士所认为的市场定价与实际情况之间持续存在的错位现象。【原文：Iron ore’s robust start to the year continues to highlight what many observers deem to be a persistent mismatch between market pricing and conditions on the ground.】

item.title: 快手筹集20亿美元离岸债券融资用于人工智能
item.description: 快手科技启动其首次境外债券发行营销，旨在为人工智能业务筹集资金，延续了去年该领域大型企业全球发债的热潮。【原文：Kuaishou Technology began marketing its maiden offshore bond offering as it looks to bolster funding for artificial intelligence, extending last year’s wave of global debt sales by major companies in the sector.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注日元可能跌至165关口前遭遇干预
item.description: 对冲基金无视日元干预警告，在货币期权市场押注日元兑美元汇率可能跌至165左右，才会引发日本当局出手干预。【原文：Hedge funds are ignoring yen intervention warnings and wagering in the currency option markets that it may fall toward 165 to a dollar before Japanese authorities step in.】

item.title: 日本在野党谋合并 紧急选举临近
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，日本最大在野党与前执政联盟伙伴正就深化合作展开磋商，以期在即将举行的选举中加强协作，并考虑未来合并的可能性。【原文：Japan’s largest opposition party and a former ruling coalition partner are in discussions to cooperate more deeply in an upcoming election, with an eye on a potential merger, according to local media.】

item.title: 韩国央行维持利率不变，因担忧韩元疲软及房地产市场复苏
item.description: 韩国央行维持基准利率不变，此举符合市场普遍预期。当局正密切关注韩元贬值态势，同时警惕持续升温的房地产市场引发金融失衡的风险。【原文：South Korea’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged in a widely expected move, as authorities monitor the weakening won along with risks of financial imbalances stemming from a persistent property market rally.】

item.title: 对冲基金重燃阿根廷GDP挂钩证券争议
item.description: 奥瑞利斯资本管理公司及其他对冲基金集团重新提起诉讼，要求阿根廷支付与该国经济表现挂钩的证券款项。【原文：Aurelius Capital Management and a group of other hedge funds renewed a lawsuit against Argentina seeking payments on securities tied to the performance of the South American nation’s economy.】

item.title: 无印良品股价飙升，业绩超预期，全球销售额激增
item.description: 无印良品运营商良品计划公司股价创下三个月来最大涨幅，因其第一季度业绩超出预期，主要得益于全球销售增长、供应链优化以及对价格折扣的更严格管控。【原文：Muji operator Ryohin Keikaku Co. rose the most in three months after first-quarter earnings beat expecations, driven by stronger global sales, supply-chain improvements and tighter control of price markdowns.】

item.title: 对冲基金在日本聘请人才猎头以把握市场复苏机遇
item.description: 日本对冲基金的招聘热潮正达到白热化程度。最新抢手职位：人才猎头。【原文：A hiring spree among hedge funds in Japan is reaching fever pitch. The latest must-have: talent scouts.】

item.title: 前英格兰银行官员称放宽银行资本规则是错误之举
item.description: 据英国央行两位前高级官员称，该行放宽资本要求将增加股东分红，但对提振整体经济作用有限。【原文：The Bank of England’s relaxation of capital requirements will lift shareholder payouts but do little to boost the wider economy, according to two of the central bank’s former senior officials.】

item.title: 孟买投票决定修复困扰数百万人的基础设施问题
item.description: 孟买以坑坑洼洼的道路、交通拥堵和季风洪水闻名。本周四，市政当局将举行迟来的选举，选出新议员以提升这座印度金融中心的城市面貌。【原文：Mumbai is known for potholed roads, traffic snarls and monsoon flooding. On Thursday, the municipality will hold long overdue elections to choose new councilors to upgrade India’s financial capital.】

item.title: XAI阻止Grok生成真实人物的性化图像
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克旗下的xAI公司正禁用其Grok人工智能聊天机器人生成真实人物色情图像的功能，此前该公司因允许该工具对妇女和儿童造成伤害而遭到广泛批评。【原文：Elon Musk’s xAI is disabling the ability for people to use its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot to create sexualized images of real people, following widespread criticism that the company was allowing women and children to be victimized by the tool.】

item.title: 澳大利亚MI1月通胀预期降至4.6%
item.description: 墨尔本应用经济与社会研究所发布其1月份消费者调查结果。【原文：Melbourne Institute of Applied Economic and Social Research releases results of its January consumer survey.】

item.title: 英国房产中介称预算案后房市正迎来转机
item.description: 英国房产中介在12月变得更加乐观，因为借贷成本的降低和预算不确定性的消除，缓解了去年大部分时间笼罩在房地产市场上的阴霾。【原文：UK estate agents grew more optimistic in December as easing borrowing costs and an end to budget uncertainty lifted some of the gloom that hung over the housing market for much of last year.】

item.title: 泰国长期债券前景因财政担忧在投票前转暗
item.description: 随着泰国大选临近，市场对财政宽松政策的担忧日益加剧，给长期债券带来压力，促使投资者押注其相对于短期票据的持续表现不佳。【原文：As Thailand’s general election nears, rising concerns about fiscal largesse are adding pressure on longer-dated bonds, spurring bets for sustained underperformance versus short-term notes.】

item.title: KKR亚洲信贷基金吸引75%新投资者，脱钩趋势加剧
item.description: 据高管透露，随着经济脱钩加剧，企业正寻求扩大投资范围并规避地缘政治风险，KKR & Co.的25亿美元亚洲私募信贷基金中有四分之三资金来自新投资者。【原文：KKR & Co. raised three-quarters of its $2.5 billion Asia private credit fund from new investors, as deepening economic decoupling pushes firms to broaden exposure and hedge geopolitical risk, according to top executives.】

item.title: 伊朗经济抗议如何爆发——以及可能如何终结
item.description:
今日《重大事件》聚焦：持续数周的抗议活动与国际干预的可能性，正对伊朗政权构成生存威胁。

【原文：

Today on the Big Take: Weeks of protests and the prospect of international intervention pose existential threats to Iran’s regime.

】

item.title: 越南最有权势的人物效仿中国习近平，瞄准双重目标
item.description:
林郑月娥正寻求在即将召开的关键共产党大会上兼任两个职务，以巩固权力。她的改革举措虽赢得商界赞誉，却在党内遭遇阻力。【原文：

To Lam is seeking a pair of roles going into a crucial Communist Party Congress in order to consolidate power, as his reforms draw praise from business but meet resistance within party ranks.

】

item.title: 金银价格在创下历史新高后小幅回落
item.description: 金银价格在上一交易日飙升至历史高位后回落，此前投资者纷纷涌入大宗商品市场，将其作为其他金融资产的替代选择。【原文：Gold and silver dipped after surging to records in the previous session as investors piled into commodities as an alternative to other financial assets.】

item.title: 白银价格飙升引发美国人疯狂买卖金币
item.description: 上次白银如此火爆时，Reddit用户蜂拥而至推高价格，引发的狂热令经销商应接不暇。当前白银的涨势正重演类似局面。【原文：The last time silver was this hot, Reddit posters piled in to drive prices even higher, creating a frenzy that overwhelmed dealers. The metal’s current rally has set off a similar dynamic.】

item.title: 必和必拓与力拓将在皮尔巴拉地区合作开发铁矿项目
item.description: 全球两大矿业巨头必和必拓集团与力拓集团将联手在西澳大利亚皮尔巴拉地区开采2亿吨铁矿石。【原文：BHP Group and Rio Tinto Group, the world’s two biggest mining companies, will join forces to extract 200 million tons of iron ore in the Pilbara region of Western Australia.】

item.title: 油价下跌，因特朗普暗示美国对伊朗的回应将暂缓
item.description: 油价六天来首次下跌，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普暗示可能暂缓对伊朗采取军事行动。【原文：Oil fell for the first time in six days after US President Donald Trump signaled he may hold off on attacking Iran for now.】

item.title: 日本IPO市场热度消退，小额股票发售消失
item.description: 日本新股上市首日抛售的盈利空间正在缩小，投资者对此趋势表示欢迎，认为这表明上市企业质量正在提升。【原文：Japan’s initial public offerings have become less profitable to flip on their trading debut, a trend investors have welcomed as an indication of higher quality companies coming to market.】

item.title: 尼日利亚财政部长表示若通缩持续则存在降息空间
item.description: 尼日利亚财政部长表示，若通胀持续回落，他预计央行将很快降息，从而缓解因油价波动而承受压力的政府财政状况。【原文：Nigerian finance minister said he expects the central bank to cut interest rates soon if inflation continues to cool, easing pressure on government finances strained by volatile oil prices.】

item.title: 中国寻求对向委内瑞拉提供数十亿美元贷款的保障
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国官员已寻求与委内瑞拉和美国官员进行会谈，以获得关于其向该南美国家提供贷款的保证。【原文：Chinese officials have sought talks with Venezuelan and US officials to get assurances over its loans to the South American country, according to people familiar with the matter.】
